topic.content:
Rose: 早上好！ 

Zǎoshang hǎo! 

(Good morning!) 


 Jake： 你好，你叫什么名字？ 

Zǎoshang hǎo, nǐ jiào shénme míngzì? 

(Good morning what is your name?) 


 Rose: 我叫莲。你呢？ 

Wǒ jiào Rose. Nǐ ne? 

(My name is Rose. How about you?) 


 Jake： 我叫杰克。 你多大？ 

Wǒ jiào jiékè. nǐ duō dà? 

(My name is Jake. How old are you?) 


 Rose: 我二十一岁, 你呢 

Wǒ èrshiyí, ni ne? 

(I am 21 years old. How about you?) 


 Jake: 我二十岁  很高兴见到你 

Wǒ èrshí suì. Hěn gāoxìng jiàn dào nǐ 

(Im 20 years old. nice to meet you) 


Rose: 我也很高兴见到你 

Wǒ yě hěn gāoxìng jiàndào nǐ 

(Nice to meet you too.) 


 Jake： 这是你的狗吗？ 

Zhè shì nǐ de gǒu ma? 

(Is this your dog?) 


Rose: 对,是 我 的 狗. 

Duì, shì wǒ de gǒu. 

(Correct, my dog.) 


Jake: 它叫什么名字 

Tā jiào shénme míngzì? 

(What is its name?) 


Rose: 它的名字是Chelsea 

Tā de míngzì shì Chelsea. 

(Its name is Chelsea.) 


 Jake: 它很漂亮. 它几岁？ 

Tā hěn piàoliang. Tā jǐ suì? 

(It is very beautiful. How old is it?) 


 Rose: 它两岁. 

Tā liǎng suì. 

(It's two years old.) 


 Jake: 好，对不起我得走了 

Hǎo duìbuqǐ wǒ děi zǒu 

(Okay, Sorry I have to go) 


Rose: 好的，没问题，再见 

Hǎo de, méi wèntí, zàijiàn 

(Okay no problem, bye)

Introduction

Before proceeding to the lesson, we inform you that this page is used for educational purposes. Every picture that is used from google are for illustrations only, credit is for the owner.

BASIC CONVERSATION

Conversation

Rose:    早上好！

Zǎoshang hǎo!

(Good morning!)

 

Jake： 你好，你叫什么名字？

            Zǎoshang hǎo, nǐ jiào shénme míngzì?

(Good morning what is your name?)

 

Rose:    我叫莲。你呢？

            Wǒ jiào Rose. Nǐ ne?

(My name is Rose. How about you?)

 

Jake： 我叫杰克。 你多大？

            Wǒ jiào jiékè. nǐ duō dà?

(My name is Jake. How old are you?)

 

Rose:    我二十一岁, 你呢

            Wǒ èrshiyí, ni ne?

(I am 21 years old. How about you?)

 

Jake:    我二十岁  很高兴见到你

Wǒ èrshí suì. Hěn gāoxìng jiàn dào nǐ

(Im 20 years old. nice to meet you)

 

Rose:    我也很高兴见到你

            Wǒ yě hěn gāoxìng jiàndào nǐ

            (Nice to meet you too.)

 

Jake： 这是你的狗吗？

            Zhè shì nǐ de gǒu ma?

(Is this your dog?)

 

 

Rose:    对,是 我 的 狗.

            Duì, shì wǒ de gǒu.

            (Correct, my dog.)

 

Jake:     它叫什么名字

            Tā jiào shénme míngzì?

            (What is its name?)

 

Rose:    它的名字是Chelsea

Tā de míngzì shì Chelsea.

(Its name is Chelsea.)

 

                                                                                    Jake:    它很漂亮. 它几岁？

Tā hěn piàoliang. Tā jǐ suì?

(It is very beautiful. How old is it?)

                                                                                   

                                                                                    Rose:    它两岁.

                                                                                                Tā liǎng suì.

                                                                                                (It's two years old.)

 

Jake:     好，对不起我得走了

            Hǎo duìbuqǐ wǒ děi zǒu

            (Okay, Sorry I have to go)

 

Rose:    好的，没问题，再见

            Hǎo de, méi wèntí, zàijiàn

(Okay no problem, bye)

Jake： 再见

            Zàijiàn

(Bye.)

 

                                                                                   

Rose:    杰克，等等

                                                                                                                                    Lánzhù Děngdài

                                                                                                                                    (Jake stop, wait.)

 

Jake:    它是什么

            Tā shì shénme?

(What is it Rose?)

                                                                                   

                                                                                    Rose:    这是您的钱包吗？

                                                Zhè shì nín de qiánbāo ma?

                                                                                                (Is this your wallet?)

                                                                                    Jake:    是的,是我的

                                                                                                Shì de shì wǒ de

(Yes, it’s mine)

                                                                                   

                                                                                    Rose:    钱包里有多少钱?

                                                                                                Qiánbāo li yǒu duōshǎo qián?

                                                                                                (How much is inside the wallet?)

                                                                                   

                                                                                    Jake:    三十八元，对吗？

                                                                                                Sānshíbā yuán, duì ma?

                                                                                                (Thirty-eight Yuan, right?)

 

                                                                                    Rose:   对, 给你!        

Duì, gěi nǐ!

                                                                                                (Right, I'll give you.)

 

                                                                                    Jake:    谢谢你!

Xièxiè nǐ!

(Thanks to you!)

 

                                                                                    Rose:   不客气!

                                                                                                Bù kèqì!

                                                                                                (Welcome!)

 

PICTURES

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

            你好！                                 再见      

                                Nǐ hǎo!                                                                                   Zàijiàn

                                                                                

 

 

 

 

 

     很高兴见到你                                          钱包                                                                谢谢

Hěn gāoxìng jiàn dào nǐ                                                  qiánbāo                                                            Xièxiè

 

 

NEW WORDS

我      Wǒ                I/me                                              名字         míngzì                name

狗                 gǒu                       dog                            它                       tā                         it

漂亮            piàoliang             pretty/beautiful            两                       liǎng                    two

那                    nà                    that                              这                       zhè                     this

钱包                qiánbāo            wallet                          里面                   Lǐmiàn                 inside

多少                duōshǎo           how many/how much 外部                     Wàibù                 outside

钱                    qián                 money                         元                       Yuán                   Chinese money

对                    duì                   right/correct               给                        gěi                     give

谢谢     Xièxiè              Thank you
